ID.label: ID
ID.notProvided: The ID field is required but was not provided.
ID.invalidType: The ID field does not contain valid data. This field must be a string value.
ID.invalidLength: The ID field is too long. This field must be no more than 35 bytes long.

NAME.label: NAME
NAME.notProvided: The NAME field is required but was not provided.
NAME.invalidType: The NAME field does not contain valid data. This field must be a string value.
NAME.invalidLength: The NAME field is too long. This field must be no more than 50 bytes long.

RANK.label: RANK
RANK.invalidType: The RANK field does not contain valid data. This field must be a numeric value.
RANK.invalidLength: The RANK field is too long. This field must be no more than 22 bytes long.
